questions.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C formulation designed to brighten skin and fade dark spots.

questions.question: Which skin types can use this serum?
questions.answer: It is suitable for oily and combination skin types.

questions.question: What ingredients does the serum contain?
questions.answer: It includes Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: Does the product help brighten skin?
questions.answer: Yes, it helps brighten the skin and reduce dark spots.

questions.question: How does the serum help with dark spots?
questions.answer: The Vitamin C concentration helps fade dark spots over time.

questions.question: How should I apply the serum?
questions.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

questions.question: Can I use it daily?
questions.answer: Yes, it is recommended for daily morning use.

questions.question: Will I experience any side effects?
questions.answer: Some users may feel mild tingling, especially those with sensitive skin.

questions.question: Should I patch-test before use?
questions.answer: Yes, patch-testing is recommended if you have sensitive skin.

questions.question: What is the price of the serum?
Is it affordable for beginners?
questions.answer: Yes, ₹699 is considered an accessible price point for a Vitamin C serum.

questions.question: How does this serum compare to other Vitamin C serums?
questions.answer: It offers a standard 10% concentration with added Hyaluronic Acid, suitable for oily and combination skin.

questions.question: Is it stronger than most Vitamin C serums?
questions.answer: No, 10% is a moderate, beginner-friendly strength.

questions.question: Can beginners use this serum?
questions.answer: Yes, the 10% concentration makes it beginner friendly.

questions.question: Should it be used before or after moisturizer?
questions.answer: Apply it before moisturizer and sunscreen.
